      • dottedLine

        private void dottedLine(int x,
                        int y,
                        int length,
                        boolean isVertical)
        Creates a dotted line that is either horizontal or vertical from the origin point and for a certain length. NOTE: This only draws in the two standard states of lines: horizontal (default behavior) and vertical.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to originate the line from.
        y - the y coordinate to originate the line from.
        length - the length of the line to be drawn.
        isVertical - a flag to determine if the line is to be drawn vertically.

      • dashedLine

        private void dashedLine(int x,
                        int y,
                        int length,
                        boolean isVertical)
        Creates a dashed line that is either horizontal or vertical from the origin point and for a certain length. NOTE: This only draws in the two standard states of lines: horizontal (default behavior) and vertical.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to originate the line from.
        y - the y coordinate to originate the line from.
        length - the length of the line to be drawn.
        isVertical - a flag to determine if the line is to be drawn vertically.

      • drawArrow

        private void drawArrow(int x,
                       int y,
                       int length,
                       boolean isLeft,
                       boolean isUp,
                       boolean isDown)
        Creates an arrow at the given origin point and for a certain length. NOTE: This only draws in the four cardinal directions: Up, Down, Left, and Right (default behavior).
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to originate the line from.
        y - the y coordinate to originate the line from.
        length - the length of the line to be drawn.
        isLeft - a flag to determine if the arrow is pointing left.
        isUp - a flag to determine if the arrow is pointing up.
        isDown - a flag to determine if the arrow is pointing down.
